_meanings:
{@--1@} Unsteady,
uncertain; not to the point, not
very important; {#Bftyo'Bftya iti#} 
{#Â°kametat#} <ls>Pt. 1.</ls>

{@--2@} (in Logic) Name of
one of the five main divisions of
{#hetvABAsa#} (fallacies,) otherwise called
{#savyaBicAra#}. It is of three kinds:-- ({%a%})
{#sADAraRa#}, where the {#hetu#} is found both
in the {#sapakza#} and {#vipakza#}, the argument
being therefore too general. ({%b%})
{#asADAraRa#} where the {%hetu%} is in the
{#pakza#} alone, the argument being not
general enough. ({%c%}) {#anupasaMhArI#} which
embraces every known thing in the
{#pakza#}, the argument being 
non-conclusive.
